item.description:
So it's going to be a rainy weekend - how about the next best thing to staying at home with on-demand: a local movie with dinner out earlier if you can make it? C'mon - you know you're going to get cabin fever if you stay in this weekend.

The Women starts at 7:15pm at Cinemark on Rte. 9 in Hadley. For those who want to have dinner first, let's meet at Chili's at 5:45pm and then go to the movies.

If you don't want to have dinner at Chili's, then meet up in front of the theater inside the mall at 7:00pm.

This is a joint meetup with the Spice of Life group.

For a description of the movie, see link below:
http://movies.yahoo.c...

--Lindy
item.name: Movie Night - The Women
